title: To all of you (나의 모든 이들에게)
lyrics: Uulhaedo dwae da gwaen chanh-ajil geoya Seulpeohaedo dwae da jina gal keonikka Malhaejwodo dwae neoui bi mil gat-eun geos Naega dasineun an apeu ge hae julge Neoga apeun geos da ihaehal geoya Neoga seulpeumyeon naega dallyeogalge Ne ma eum-e eotteon sangcheo iss-eodo Naegam ma-eummeoggo nasge hal geoya U ulhamyeon naege dallyeo wa Seul peojimyeon naege dallyeo wa U ulhamyeon naege dallyeo wa Da saekkamahge kkameog-eul su issge hae julge Apahaedo dwae geumbang naajil geoya Swieogado dwae neomu dallyeowassjanh-a Wonmanghaedo dwae nege sangcheo jun geosdeul Naega dasu neun honja duji anh-eulge Neoga apeun geos da al-ajul geoya Mal an haedo naega al-achae julge Nege nalkaloun gasi issdaedo Naega ma-eum yeol-eo saranghal yeoya U ulhamyeon naege dallyeo wa Seul peojimyeon naege dallyeo wa U ulhamyeon naege dallyeo wa Da saekkamahge kkameog-eul su issge hae julge U ulhamyeon naege dallyeo wa Seul peojimyeon naege dallyeo wa U ulhamyeon naege dallyeo wa Da saekkamahge kkameog-eul su issge hae julge Da saekkamahge ijgo sal-a gage hae jul ge
